name: lunalytics
tagline: A self-hosted analytics dashboard for tracking product metrics
description: Lunalytics is a self-hosted analytics dashboard with built-in metrics tracking and visual reporting. It enables event capturing, KPIs, and interactive charts for better insights into user behavior and product usage.

features.description: Interactive charts and graphs provide clear insights into KPIs, trends, and user engagement metrics at

features.description: Build tailored visualizations with drag-and-drop widgets and real-time data updates to monitor metrics relevant to

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Full data control with custom deployment options to own your analytics infrastructure and ensure data

features.title: REST API
features.description: Integrate analytics data with external tools via REST APIs for custom reporting and automated workflows
